sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: The above installation script updates the catalog.
Using only the most current 3.x version of DocBook SGML DTD requires the following:

screen.userinput:
cat >> /usr/share/sgml/docbook/sgml-dtd-&sgml-dtd-3-version;/catalog << "EOF" -- Begin Single Major Version catalog changes --
PUBLIC "-//Davenport//DTD DocBook V3.0//EN" "docbook.dtd"
-- End Single Major Version catalog changes -- EOF
